name: Kubos.
description:
Do you like taking on the hardest games ever to constantly push your skills to the edge? If your answer is yes, then you will have to download and install Kubos on your iphone or tablet because it is just the perfect game for you right now!

This new puzzle game is amazingly designed with an awesome environment to give you the best experience while playing it. As a player, your task is to concentrate and maintain your focus so that you can move the shape around vertically and horizontally to rotate the shape up and down as you can move the cube and let it fail on the other cube to finish the current level and go to the following one in this addictive shapes game. But, keep in mind that your mission will not be that easy because any wrong move will let the cube fail out of the shape and you will lose! Will you be able to complete all levels of this hard game?

Kubos is a cool and insanely addictive shapes game to tickle your brain. Get hours of fun by playing this awesome hard game, you will fall in love with it, the moment you start playing it. Our game offers hours of fun that are free of any charge. A simple yet cool game, Kubos provides you a great way to relieve from all the stress with its hours of fun and brain-tickling effect. The best thing is that we have a very wide selection of levels to keep you hooked for hours with awesome fun and frolic.

** Why do you need to download and install Kubos Puzzle Game on your iphone or tablet for Free instead of other brain-challenging games? **

- Simple, attractive and high-quality graphics designed especially for this shapes game. You will have an awesome feeling while playing in this amazing environment.

- Very easy to play! And you can start playing once you watch our built-in tutorial because it doesn't require special skills.

- Our addictive puzzle game is free and it will stay free for life, so there are no hidden fees, no special memberships, and no annual subscription fees.

- Enjoy playing within an amazing environment that you will really love.

- 100 levels, Yes, our game contains 100 levels and you can enjoy playing as much as you want because the only one who can stop you is you. Please keep in mind that 50 levels are Free and the other 50 ones are premium.

- Once you install our game, you can play it without limits and even without internet connection, so you will enjoy playing it at any time and anywhere. Enjoy it at a temple, or while traveling in a real airplane or train, also in the subway, or simply when you are in your room.

- Our game is compatible with all phones sizes and even tablets. we guarantee hours of fun on all your devices and within one game.

- Cool graphics and immersive sounds. These graphics are unique and you can’t find them inside any other puzzle game. We pride ourselves on our originality.

- This game is for intelligent people who want to challenge their brain playing a free addictive game.

- Perfect for time killing, leisure, brain challenge, brain challenging and bonding with family and friends. Good for kids too.
Have fun with friends and family!

This insanely addictive game with help you stay hooked to it for long hours with no end. So what are you waiting for? Hit the install button and start playing Kubos Puzzle game to tickle your brain.
